name: Nations
description:
Summary

A game I describe like an ant farm. You can just sit back watch, or if wished use the built-in tools to edit the world, and nations!

Features

  • Custom map support
  • Real-time map editor
  • One man mode (focused more on the people rather than nations)
  • Simple random map gen
  • Customization

Change-log

  • disabled update settings due to a bug
  • added width and height options to random gen
  • background is lighter
